ApplyCDBProxy.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cdb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ApplyCDBProxy
<Common request parameters>

{
    "UniqVpcId": "xx",
    "InstanceId": "xx",
    "SecurityGroup": [
        "xx"
    ],
    "Mem": 1,
    "UniqSubnetId": "xx",
    "Desc": "xx",
    "Cpu": 1,
    "ProxyCount": 1
}
ApplyCDBProxy.title: Creating a database proxy

BalanceRoGroupLoad.title: Rebalancing the loads of instances in an RO group

CloseCDBProxy.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cdb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CloseCDBProxy
<Common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceId": "cdb-test",
    "ProxyGroupId": "proxy-test",
    "OnlyCloseRW": true
}
CloseCDBProxy.title: Disabling the database proxy

CloseWanService.title: Disabling public network access for an instance

CreateCloneInstance.title: Cloning an instance and rolling back the clone to a specific point in time

CreateDBImportJob.title: Creating a data import task by using the COS URL

CreateRoInstanceIp.title: Creating a VIP exclusive to a TencentDB read-only replica

DescribeAccountPrivileges.title: Querying the information of TencentDB account permissions

DescribeAccounts.title: Querying the information of all TencentDB accounts

DescribeAsyncRequestInfo.title: Querying the execution result of an async task

DescribeBackupConfig.title: Querying the configuration information of a TencentDB instance backup

DescribeBackups.title: Querying the data backup file list

DescribeCDBProxy.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cdb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeCDBProxy
<Common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceId": "xx",
    "ProxyGroupId": "xx"
}
DescribeCDBProxy.title: Querying the information of database proxy

    "InstanceId": "cdb-oaj9cbla"
}
